title: Search the Cellar

Find a way to finish The Necromancy of Thay.

We managed to read most of the book, absorbing some of it's necromantic power, but it snapped shut before we could finish it. There must be a way to reach the end.

How to unlock Search the Cellar

Read the Apprentice's Journal

Search the Cellar Rewards

Speak with Dead spell

Search the Cellar Walkthrough
